summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5564 for the improvement of 8th Avenue South, from Myrtle Street to the Duwamish Waterway; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 72405, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
